name: Spider Solitaire – Card Games
description:
Spider Solitaire combines the original rules of one of the most popular classic card games with a set of exciting features. Enjoy a whole new experience with your favorite game, brought to you by game experts from a top developer. Challenge your mind by playing Spider Solitaire, reach higher stages with every consecutive win, and beat your high score!

Spider Solitaire highlights:

- Classic gameplay
Stack the cards of a suit in descending order (from King to Ace) to win the game. Adjust the difficulty level by playing with 1, 2 or 4 suits.

- Keep your mind active
Train your brain and practice to reach higher stages and earn as many points as you can.

- Relax and unwind
Flip the switch from the daily grind to a relaxing pastime. Play the card game during your breaks or after a long work day wherever you are on your mobile device.

Spider Solitaire features:

- Various difficulty levels
Choose the number of suits - 1, 2 or 4 - to adjust the game to your experience, and have as much fun as you want.

- Stages
Master your strategy to win Spider Solitaire games, move to higher stages and beat your best score! The higher the stage you reach, the more points you get!

- Seasonal Events
Reveal unique pictures while playing card games of several difficulty levels. Complete Seasonal Events and build your own collection of specially crafted postcards!

- Daily Challenges
Earn trophies every month by playing Spider Solitaire challenges every day.

- Customizable cards and backgrounds
Choose from a variety of themes to help you stay focused and enjoy the game more.

- Hints and undos
Made a wrong move or unsure what to do in a game? Smart hints and undos will have you covered!

- Simple tap or drag controls
Enjoy a smooth experience by simply tapping or dragging cards.

- Auto-save
Continue playing where you left off.

- Left-hand mode
A special interface for left-handed people

Train your brain and have limitless fun on the way to beating your high score in Spider Solitaire!
